name: First Notice of Loss (FNOL) to Claim Assignment
description: Receives initial loss notifications through 24/7 hotline or catastrophe response channels, documents preliminary loss information, and routes claims to appropriate adjusters or examiners based on claim type and complexity. Ensures rapid acknowledgment and claim initiation within service level agreements.
objective: Establish rapid first contact with claimants, capture critical loss information, and ensure claims are routed efficiently to the right adjuster to minimize claim cycle time and improve customer satisfaction.

tasks.name: Receive and Log Initial Loss Notification
tasks.description: Capture incoming loss notification through 24/7 hotline, catastrophe response channel, or digital submission and create initial claim record with claimant contact information and loss description.
tasks.expected_output: Claim intake form completed with claimant details, loss date/time, policy number, and preliminary loss description; claim number generated and logged in system

primary_role.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - 24/7 Hotline

supporting_roles.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - Catastrophe Response

tasks.name: Conduct Preliminary Loss Investigation
tasks.description: Gather detailed information about the loss including type of loss, extent of damage, injuries, third-party involvement, and immediate emergency needs through structured questioning.
tasks.expected_output: Completed preliminary loss investigation report with loss type classification, damage assessment summary, injury status, and emergency response requirements documented

primary_role.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - 24/7 Hotline

tasks.name: Verify Policy Coverage and Eligibility
tasks.description: Access policy database to confirm policy is active, verify coverage applicability to reported loss type, and identify any exclusions or limitations that may apply.
tasks.expected_output: Coverage verification report confirming policy status, applicable coverage limits, deductibles, and any relevant exclusions or special conditions

tasks.name: Classify Claim Type and Complexity Level
tasks.description: Analyze loss information to determine claim category (property, liability, health, life, disability), complexity level (routine, moderate, complex), and identify any special handling requirements such as catastrophe designation or fraud indicators.
tasks.expected_output: Claim classification document specifying claim type, complexity rating, special handling flags, and recommended adjuster expertise requirements

tasks.name: Screen for Fraud Indicators and Red Flags
tasks.description: Review claim details against fraud detection algorithms and historical patterns to identify suspicious indicators requiring investigation or enhanced scrutiny before assignment.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud risk assessment report with risk score, identified red flags, and recommendation for standard processing or fraud investigation referral

tasks.name: Assess Emergency Response Requirements
tasks.description: Evaluate whether claim requires immediate emergency assistance such as emergency repairs, medical services, emergency accommodation, or emergency adjuster dispatch based on loss severity and claimant needs.
tasks.expected_output: Emergency response assessment documenting immediate assistance needs, authorization for emergency services, and dispatch instructions if applicable

primary_role.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - Catastrophe Response

supporting_roles.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - 24/7 Hotline

tasks.name: Identify Appropriate Adjuster or Examiner Specialty
tasks.description: Match claim requirements with available adjuster expertise based on claim type, complexity level, geographic location, and current workload to ensure optimal assignment.
tasks.expected_output: Adjuster assignment recommendation document specifying recommended adjuster role, expertise requirements, and priority level for assignment

tasks.name: Route Claim to Assigned Adjuster or Examiner
tasks.description: Transmit complete claim file with all preliminary documentation, investigation notes, and assignment instructions to selected adjuster or examiner through claims management system.
tasks.expected_output: Claim routed in system with notification sent to assigned adjuster; claim status updated to 'Assigned'; assignment confirmation logged with timestamp

tasks.name: Generate and Send Claim Acknowledgment to Claimant
tasks.description: Create formal claim acknowledgment letter or communication confirming receipt of loss notification, providing claim number, assigned adjuster information, next steps, and expected timeline.
tasks.expected_output: Claim acknowledgment letter or email sent to claimant within service level agreement timeframe; communication logged in claim file with delivery confirmation

tasks.name: Schedule Adjuster Appointment or Site Inspection
tasks.description: Coordinate with assigned adjuster to schedule claim investigation appointment, site inspection, or medical examination based on claim type and claimant availability.
tasks.expected_output: Appointment scheduled with date, time, and location confirmed; appointment details communicated to claimant; adjuster calendar updated; appointment confirmation logged in claim file

tasks.name: Organize and Digitize Claim Documentation
tasks.description: Collect all preliminary documentation including intake forms, investigation notes, policy documents, and supporting materials; organize into claim file and convert to digital format for system storage.
tasks.expected_output: Complete digital claim file with all documents organized by category, indexed, and stored in claims management system; documentation inventory log created

tasks.name: Establish Reserve and Initial Estimate
tasks.description: Based on preliminary loss information and claim classification, establish initial reserve amount and loss estimate to ensure adequate funding for claim settlement.
tasks.expected_output: Reserve establishment document with initial reserve amount, loss estimate methodology, and supporting calculations; reserve recorded in financial system

tasks.name: Monitor Service Level Agreement Compliance
tasks.description: Track claim processing timeline against service level agreements to ensure acknowledgment, assignment, and appointment scheduling occur within required timeframes; escalate if delays occur.
tasks.expected_output: Service level agreement compliance report documenting all milestone timestamps; escalation alerts generated for any breaches; performance metrics recorded

tasks.name: Identify Subrogation and Recovery Opportunities
tasks.description: Analyze claim circumstances to identify potential subrogation opportunities against third parties or salvage recovery potential; flag for subrogation specialist review.
tasks.expected_output: Subrogation opportunity assessment documenting third-party liability potential, recovery prospects, and referral to subrogation specialist if applicable

tasks.name: Generate FNOL Completion Report and Handoff Documentation
tasks.description: Create comprehensive FNOL completion report summarizing all intake activities, preliminary findings, claim assignment, and next steps; provide formal handoff documentation to assigned adjuster.
tasks.expected_output: FNOL completion report with executive summary, claim details, preliminary investigation findings, assignment information, and adjuster handoff checklist; report filed in claim record

quick_wins.task: Screen for Fraud Indicators and Red Flags
Route Claim to Assigned Adjuster or Examiner

opportunities.recommendation: Automate 4 fully automatable tasks to save ~0.5 hours per cycle
tasks: Verify Policy Coverage and Eligibility
Screen for Fraud Indicators and Red Flags
Route Claim to Assigned Adjuster or Examiner
Monitor Service Level Agreement Compliance

opportunities.recommendation: Augment 11 human-AI collaborative tasks for partial automation
tasks: Receive and Log Initial Loss Notification
Conduct Preliminary Loss Investigation
Classify Claim Type and Complexity Level
Assess Emergency Response Requirements
Identify Appropriate Adjuster or Examiner Specialty
Generate and Send Claim Acknowledgment to Claimant
Schedule Adjuster Appointment or Site Inspection
Organize and Digitize Claim Documentation
Establish Reserve and Initial Estimate
Identify Subrogation and Recovery Opportunities
Generate FNOL Completion Report and Handoff Documentation

affected_tasks: Receive and Log Initial Loss Notification
Conduct Preliminary Loss Investigation
Classify Claim Type and Complexity Level
patterns.recommendation: Invest in AI copilot tools to maximize augmentation benefits

patterns.description: Tasks with many dependencies may create workflow bottlenecks
affected_tasks: Organize and Digitize Claim Documentation
Monitor Service Level Agreement Compliance
Generate FNOL Completion Report and Handoff Documentation
patterns.recommendation: Review dependency chains for parallelization opportunities

recommendations.primary_strategy: Implement a phased AI augmentation approach, starting with quick wins and progressively automating more tasks
key_actions: Prioritize automation of 4 fully automatable tasks
Implement AI augmentation for 11 human-AI collaborative tasks
Review 0 human-only tasks for future augmentation potential
risks: Change management resistance from workforce transitioning to AI-augmented workflows
Data quality issues may impact AI automation effectiveness
Integration complexity with existing systems and processes
success_factors: Executive sponsorship and clear communication of AI strategy
Phased implementation with regular feedback loops
Robust training programs for workforce upskilling

name: Property & Casualty Claim Investigation and Valuation
description: Senior Claims Adjusters investigate property and casualty claims by gathering evidence, assessing coverage applicability, evaluating damages, and determining settlement amounts. Manages complex multi-party claims and catastrophe situations with mentoring of junior adjusters.
objective: Thoroughly investigate claims to determine coverage validity, accurately assess damages, and establish appropriate settlement amounts while managing risk and ensuring compliance with policy terms.

tasks.name: Initial Claim Intake and Documentation Review
tasks.description: Review and organize all initial claim documentation including policy details, loss description, preliminary damage reports, and claimant contact information to establish claim file foundation.
tasks.expected_output: Organized claim file with indexed documentation, preliminary coverage summary, and identified information gaps requiring follow-up.

tasks.name: Verify Policy Coverage and Exclusions
tasks.description: Conduct detailed review of policy terms, coverage limits, deductibles, exclusions, and endorsements to determine applicability to the reported loss.
tasks.expected_output: Coverage analysis document detailing applicable coverages, limits, deductibles, exclusions, and preliminary coverage determination with legal references.

tasks.name: Schedule and Conduct On-Site Loss Inspection
tasks.description: Arrange and perform comprehensive physical inspection of damaged property, documenting loss extent, causation, and damage patterns through photographs, measurements, and detailed notes.
tasks.expected_output: Inspection report with photographs, measurements, damage assessment, causation analysis, and preliminary damage estimates.

tasks.name: Gather Third-Party Evidence and Statements
tasks.description: Obtain statements from claimants, witnesses, and involved parties; collect police reports, medical records, repair estimates, and other corroborating evidence relevant to loss causation and damages.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive evidence file including witness statements, police reports, repair estimates, medical documentation, and third-party correspondence with authentication and chain of custody documentation.

tasks.name: Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Investigation Referral
tasks.description: Analyze claim characteristics, claimant history, and evidence patterns using fraud detection tools to identify red flags and determine if referral to fraud investigation team is warranted.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud risk assessment report with risk scoring, identified red flags, and recommendation for investigation referral or clearance to proceed with valuation.

tasks.name: Obtain and Analyze Professional Damage Valuations
tasks.description: Engage qualified appraisers, engineers, or repair contractors to provide detailed damage assessments, repair cost estimates, and replacement value calculations for complex or high-value losses.
tasks.expected_output: Professional appraisal reports, repair estimates, replacement cost analyses, and depreciation calculations with supporting documentation and expert credentials.

tasks.name: Evaluate Causation and Coverage Applicability
tasks.description: Analyze evidence and expert findings to determine whether loss causation falls within policy coverage and assess any policy condition violations or coverage defenses.
tasks.expected_output: Causation analysis document with legal conclusions regarding coverage applicability, identified policy defenses, and coverage determination with supporting rationale.

tasks.name: Calculate Claim Settlement Amount and Reserves
tasks.description: Compute settlement amount based on coverage limits, deductibles, policy terms, damage valuations, and applicable depreciation; establish appropriate claim reserves for outstanding items.
tasks.expected_output: Settlement calculation worksheet with itemized damages, applied deductibles, coverage limits, depreciation calculations, and final settlement amount with reserve recommendations.

tasks.name: Identify and Document Subrogation Opportunities
tasks.description: Analyze claim circumstances to identify potential subrogation or recovery opportunities against responsible third parties and document findings for subrogation team referral.
tasks.expected_output: Subrogation analysis document identifying liable third parties, potential recovery amounts, supporting evidence, and referral to Subrogation Specialist with case summary.

tasks.name: Prepare Claim Settlement Recommendation and Documentation
tasks.description: Compile comprehensive claim file with investigation findings, coverage analysis, damage valuations, settlement calculations, and formal recommendation for claim approval or denial.
tasks.expected_output: Complete claim settlement package including investigation summary, coverage determination, damage analysis, settlement calculation, supporting documentation index, and formal recommendation.

tasks.name: Obtain Management Review and Approval for Complex Claims
tasks.description: Submit claim file to Claims Team Lead or management for review and approval of settlement recommendation, particularly for high-value, multi-party, or legally complex claims.
tasks.expected_output: Management review documentation with approval or requested modifications, compliance verification, and authorization for claim settlement or denial.

tasks.name: Communicate Settlement Decision to Claimant
tasks.description: Prepare and deliver clear, professional communication to claimant explaining coverage determination, damage assessment, settlement amount, and next steps in claim resolution process.
tasks.expected_output: Settlement letter or communication documenting decision, supporting rationale, payment details, appeal rights, and claimant acknowledgment of communication.

tasks.name: Process Claim Payment and Settlement Finalization
tasks.description: Authorize and process settlement payment to claimant or payees, update claim status to closed, and ensure all documentation is properly filed and archived per retention policies.
tasks.expected_output: Payment authorization documentation, settlement confirmation, closed claim file with complete documentation index, and archived records meeting compliance requirements.

tasks.name: Conduct Post-Settlement Quality Assurance Review
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive quality assurance review of completed claim file to verify investigation thoroughness, coverage analysis accuracy, damage assessment validity, and compliance with company standards and regulations.
tasks.expected_output: Quality assurance review report documenting file completeness, investigation adequacy, compliance verification, identified issues or improvements, and approval or corrective action recommendations.

tasks.name: Mentor Junior Adjusters and Document Lessons Learned
tasks.description: Review claim handling approach with junior adjusters, provide coaching on investigation techniques and valuation methodology, and document case insights for training and process improvement initiatives.
tasks.expected_output: Mentoring documentation, case study summary for training library, identified process improvement opportunities, and junior adjuster development notes.

opportunities.recommendation: Augment 8 human-AI collaborative tasks for partial automation
tasks: Initial Claim Intake and Documentation Review
Verify Policy Coverage and Exclusions
Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Investigation Referral
Calculate Claim Settlement Amount and Reserves
Identify and Document Subrogation Opportunities
Communicate Settlement Decision to Claimant
Process Claim Payment and Settlement Finalization
Conduct Post-Settlement Quality Assurance Review

affected_tasks: Initial Claim Intake and Documentation Review
Verify Policy Coverage and Exclusions
Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Investigation Referral
patterns.recommendation: Invest in AI copilot tools to maximize augmentation benefits

affected_tasks: Schedule and Conduct On-Site Loss Inspection
Gather Third-Party Evidence and Statements
Obtain and Analyze Professional Damage Valuations
patterns.recommendation: Investigate augmentation opportunities to reduce bottleneck

recommendations.primary_strategy: Invest in AI augmentation tools to support human-led tasks, focusing on efficiency gains and error reduction
key_actions: Prioritize automation of 0 fully automatable tasks
Implement AI augmentation for 8 human-AI collaborative tasks
Review 7 human-only tasks for future augmentation potential

Data quality issues may impact AI automation effectiveness
Integration complexity with existing systems and processes
success_factors: Executive sponsorship and clear communication of AI strategy
Phased implementation with regular feedback loops

name: Health Insurance Claim Adjudication and Payment
description: Claims Adjusters process health insurance claims by verifying coverage eligibility, confirming medical necessity, applying policy terms and regulatory requirements, and calculating benefit payments. Handles high-volume routine and moderately complex claims with efficient throughput.
objective: Rapidly process health claims while ensuring accurate eligibility verification, appropriate benefit calculation, and regulatory compliance to maintain high customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

tasks.name: Receive and Log Initial Claim Notification
tasks.description: Capture initial claim information from claimant including policy number, loss date, and basic loss description through intake system or hotline.
tasks.expected_output: Claim record created in system with preliminary information and unique claim number assigned

supporting_roles.title: First Notice of Loss Agent - 24/7 Hotline

tasks.name: Verify Policy Coverage and Eligibility
tasks.description: Query policy database to confirm policy is active, in-force, and covers the type of loss claimed.
tasks.expected_output: Coverage verification report documenting policy status, effective dates, coverage limits, and any exclusions applicable to claim

tasks.name: Request and Organize Medical Documentation
tasks.description: Issue requests to healthcare providers and claimant for medical records, bills, and supporting documentation needed for adjudication.
tasks.expected_output: Documentation request sent to all relevant parties with deadline; tracking log created for received documents

tasks.name: Assess Medical Necessity and Appropriateness
tasks.description: Review medical documentation to determine if services rendered were medically necessary and appropriate according to clinical guidelines and policy terms.
tasks.expected_output: Medical necessity determination document with clinical rationale and reference to applicable guidelines or policy provisions

tasks.name: Verify Deductible and Out-of-Pocket Status
tasks.description: Calculate claimant's current deductible satisfaction, out-of-pocket maximum status, and any applicable cost-sharing amounts for the benefit year.
tasks.expected_output: Deductible and cost-sharing calculation report showing remaining deductible, out-of-pocket amounts, and applicable coinsurance percentages

tasks.name: Apply Policy Terms and Benefit Limitations
tasks.description: Review and apply all applicable policy provisions including benefit maximums, frequency limitations, network status adjustments, and any plan-specific exclusions.
tasks.expected_output: Policy application summary documenting all terms applied, benefit limitations enforced, and adjustments made to claim amount

tasks.name: Verify Provider Network Status and Contracted Rates
tasks.description: Confirm whether healthcare providers are in-network and apply appropriate contracted fee schedules or allowed amounts to billed charges.
tasks.expected_output: Provider network verification report with contracted rates applied, any balance billing implications noted, and fee schedule adjustments documented

tasks.name: Conduct Fraud and Abuse Screening
tasks.description: Screen claim against fraud indicators, duplicate claim patterns, and suspicious billing practices using automated detection algorithms and manual review.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud screening report with risk assessment, any flags identified, and recommendation for approval, denial, or escalation to fraud investigation

tasks.name: Calculate Benefit Payment Amount
tasks.description: Compute the final benefit payment by applying deductible, coinsurance, out-of-pocket maximums, and all policy limitations to allowed charges.
tasks.expected_output: Benefit calculation worksheet showing step-by-step calculation from billed amount to allowed amount to patient responsibility to plan payment

tasks.name: Ensure Regulatory Compliance Review
tasks.description: Verify claim adjudication complies with applicable federal regulations (HIPAA, ACA, mental health parity) and state insurance laws.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance checklist completed documenting review of applicable regulations and confirmation of compliant adjudication decision

tasks.name: Make Final Adjudication Decision
tasks.description: Review all documentation and analysis to make final determination on claim approval, denial, or conditional approval with clear rationale.
tasks.expected_output: Adjudication decision document with approval/denial status, payment amount, patient responsibility, and detailed explanation of decision

tasks.name: Generate Explanation of Benefits (EOB)
tasks.description: Create detailed EOB document explaining claim decision, amounts paid, patient responsibility, and appeal rights in clear, compliant language.
tasks.expected_output: Formatted EOB document meeting regulatory requirements with itemized services, amounts, and clear explanation of benefits applied

tasks.name: Process Claim Payment and Issue Payment Authorization
tasks.description: Authorize payment to provider and/or claimant based on adjudication decision and initiate payment through appropriate payment method.
tasks.expected_output: Payment authorization record with payment amount, payee, payment method, and authorization code for accounting and reconciliation

tasks.name: Communicate Decision to Claimant and Provider
tasks.description: Send EOB and payment notification to claimant and provider with clear explanation of decision, amounts paid, and next steps or appeal instructions.
tasks.expected_output: Documented communication sent to claimant and provider via mail/email with confirmation of delivery and customer service contact information

tasks.name: Close Claim and Archive Documentation
tasks.description: Update claim status to closed in system, archive all supporting documentation according to retention policies, and prepare claim for analytics and reporting.
tasks.expected_output: Closed claim record with all documentation properly filed, retention dates set, and claim data available for reporting and analytics

quick_wins.task: Verify Provider Network Status and Contracted Rates
Process Claim Payment and Issue Payment Authorization

tasks: Verify Policy Coverage and Eligibility
Verify Deductible and Out-of-Pocket Status
Verify Provider Network Status and Contracted Rates
Calculate Benefit Payment Amount
Generate Explanation of Benefits (EOB)
Process Claim Payment and Issue Payment Authorization
Close Claim and Archive Documentation

name: Life Insurance Claim Review and Fraud Prevention
description: Senior Claims Examiners review and approve life insurance claims by conducting underwriting reviews, investigating potential fraud or policy violations, and determining claim eligibility before settlement. Handles high-value claims and establishes precedent for claim interpretation.
objective: Protect company from fraudulent or invalid life claims through rigorous underwriting review while ensuring legitimate claims are approved promptly and establishing consistent claim interpretation standards.

tasks.name: Initial Claim Documentation Review and Completeness Assessment
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist reviews submitted life insurance claim documentation to verify all required forms, medical records, death certificates, and policy information are present and legible.
tasks.expected_output: Documented checklist of received documents with gaps identified and request list for missing documentation

tasks.name: Verify Policy Validity and Coverage Terms
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner validates that the policy was active at time of death, confirms coverage limits, exclusions, contestability period status, and any policy modifications or riders applicable to the claim.
tasks.expected_output: Policy validation report documenting coverage status, limits, exclusions, contestability determination, and any applicable riders or modifications

tasks.name: Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Pattern Analysis
tasks.description: Fraud Investigator - Digital & Analytics analyzes claim characteristics against fraud detection algorithms and historical patterns to identify red flags and determine fraud investigation priority level.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud risk assessment report with risk score, identified red flags, and recommendation for investigation level (routine, standard, or intensive)

tasks.name: Review Medical Records and Cause of Death Documentation
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner reviews medical records, death certificate, attending physician statements, and autopsy reports (if applicable) to verify stated cause of death and identify any inconsistencies or policy exclusions.
tasks.expected_output: Medical documentation review summary with verified cause of death, timeline of events, and assessment of any exclusions or coverage limitations

tasks.name: Investigate Contestability Period and Policy Misrepresentation
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner investigates whether claim falls within contestability period and reviews application for material misrepresentations, non-disclosure, or fraud that could affect claim validity.
tasks.expected_output: Contestability investigation report documenting contestability period status, application review findings, and any identified misrepresentations with supporting evidence

tasks.name: Conduct Detailed Fraud Investigation (if Risk Indicators Present)
tasks.description: Senior Fraud Investigator conducts comprehensive investigation including interviews with beneficiaries, medical professionals, and third parties; surveillance if warranted; and evidence analysis to confirm or refute fraud suspicions.
tasks.expected_output: Detailed fraud investigation report with findings, evidence documentation, witness statements, and recommendation for claim approval, denial, or legal referral

tasks.name: Verify Beneficiary Eligibility and Claim Authority
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner verifies beneficiary designation validity, confirms claimant's legal authority to receive proceeds, reviews any disputes or competing claims, and validates beneficiary identity documentation.
tasks.expected_output: Beneficiary verification report documenting designated beneficiary status, legal authority confirmation, dispute resolution (if any), and identity verification completion

tasks.name: Calculate Claim Settlement Amount and Benefit Entitlement
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner calculates settlement amount based on policy face value, applicable riders, outstanding loans, premium arrearages, and any applicable reductions or exclusions.
tasks.expected_output: Settlement calculation worksheet documenting face value, adjustments, deductions, final settlement amount, and breakdown of any applicable riders or benefits

tasks.name: Compile Comprehensive Claim Review File and Documentation
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist organizes all review documents, investigation reports, medical records, and examiner notes into a complete claim file with clear audit trail and cross-references.
tasks.expected_output: Complete organized claim file with index, all supporting documentation, investigation reports, and audit trail documenting all review steps and decisions

tasks.name: Prepare Claim Decision Recommendation and Justification
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner synthesizes all investigation findings, medical reviews, fraud assessments, and policy analysis to prepare detailed recommendation for claim approval, denial, or conditional approval with documented justification.
tasks.expected_output: Claim decision recommendation document with clear approval/denial determination, detailed justification citing policy provisions and investigation findings, and precedent implications

tasks.name: Conduct Quality Assurance Review and Compliance Verification
tasks.description: Claims Team Lead - Adjudication performs secondary review of claim file, decision recommendation, and documentation to verify regulatory compliance, proper procedure adherence, and quality standards before final approval.
tasks.expected_output: Quality assurance checklist with compliance verification, identified issues or gaps (if any), and approval or return for correction with specific feedback

tasks.name: Issue Final Claim Decision and Settlement Authorization
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner issues final written claim decision communicating approval or denial with clear explanation of reasoning, settlement amount (if approved), and appeal rights to beneficiary.
tasks.expected_output: Formal claim decision letter with determination, detailed explanation, settlement amount, payment instructions, appeal process information, and regulatory disclosures

tasks.name: Process Settlement Payment and Coordinate Fund Transfer
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist initiates settlement payment processing, coordinates with accounting/finance for fund transfer to beneficiary, and ensures proper documentation of payment transaction.
tasks.expected_output: Payment authorization confirmation, fund transfer documentation, payment receipt, and claim closure documentation with settlement amount and payment date

tasks.name: Document Claim Precedent and Update Interpretation Guidelines
tasks.description: Senior Claims Examiner documents significant claim decisions, novel interpretations, or precedent-setting determinations in claims knowledge management system to establish consistent interpretation standards for future similar claims.
tasks.expected_output: Precedent documentation entry with claim summary, key decision factors, interpretation rationale, and applicability guidance for future claim handling

tasks.name: Conduct Post-Settlement Review and Performance Analytics
tasks.description: Senior Claims Analyst - Predictive Analytics analyzes claim processing metrics, decision outcomes, fraud investigation results, and cycle time performance to identify trends and provide recommendations for process improvements.
tasks.expected_output: Post-settlement analytics report documenting processing metrics, decision patterns, fraud detection effectiveness, cycle time analysis, and recommendations for process optimization

quick_wins.task: Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Pattern Analysis
Conduct Post-Settlement Review and Performance Analytics

opportunities.recommendation: Automate 2 fully automatable tasks to save ~3.0 hours per cycle
tasks: Conduct Fraud Risk Assessment and Pattern Analysis
Conduct Post-Settlement Review and Performance Analytics

Verify Policy Validity and Coverage Terms

Verify Beneficiary Eligibility and Claim Authority
Calculate Claim Settlement Amount and Benefit Entitlement
Compile Comprehensive Claim Review File and Documentation
Issue Final Claim Decision and Settlement Authorization
Process Settlement Payment and Coordinate Fund Transfer

name: Disability and Workers' Compensation Benefit Determination
description: Claims Examiners examine disability and workers' compensation claims by reviewing medical documentation, vocational assessments, and benefit eligibility criteria to determine initial eligibility and benefit duration. Manages ongoing claims monitoring and periodic benefit continuation reviews.
objective: Accurately determine disability benefit eligibility and duration based on medical evidence and regulatory requirements while managing ongoing claims to ensure appropriate benefit continuation and cost control.

tasks.name: Initial Claim Documentation Review and File Organization
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist organizes and catalogs all incoming disability and workers' compensation claim documentation including medical records, incident reports, and initial intake forms into a structured digital file.
tasks.expected_output: Organized claim file with indexed documentation, metadata tags, and file completeness checklist

tasks.name: Verify Claim Eligibility Against Policy Terms and Regulatory Requirements
tasks.description: Claims Examiner verifies that the claimant meets basic eligibility criteria including policy coverage dates, benefit waiting periods, and applicable regulatory requirements for disability benefits.
tasks.expected_output: Eligibility verification report documenting policy coverage status, waiting period compliance, and regulatory requirements met

tasks.name: Request and Collect Medical Documentation from Healthcare Providers
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist contacts treating physicians and healthcare providers to request comprehensive medical records, diagnostic test results, and treatment history relevant to the disability claim.
tasks.expected_output: Compiled medical records package including physician reports, diagnostic imaging, lab results, and treatment notes

tasks.name: Conduct Preliminary Medical Evidence Analysis
tasks.description: Claims Examiner reviews all medical documentation to assess the severity of the medical condition, functional limitations, and alignment with disability benefit criteria.
tasks.expected_output: Medical evidence summary documenting diagnosis, severity, functional impairments, and preliminary medical eligibility assessment

tasks.name: Order Vocational Assessment and Functional Capacity Evaluation
tasks.description: Claims Examiner arranges independent vocational assessment and functional capacity evaluation with qualified vocational rehabilitation specialists to objectively measure claimant's work capacity.
tasks.expected_output: Vocational assessment request with claimant information, medical history summary, and evaluation scope specifications

tasks.name: Review Vocational Assessment Results and Work Capacity Findings
tasks.description: Claims Examiner analyzes completed vocational assessment reports to determine claimant's residual functional capacity and ability to perform gainful employment.
tasks.expected_output: Vocational assessment analysis documenting work capacity, transferable skills, occupational limitations, and return-to-work potential

tasks.name: Perform Fraud Risk Assessment and Investigation Screening
tasks.description: Claims Examiner screens claim for fraud indicators using data analytics tools and patterns, escalating suspicious claims to fraud investigation team when warranted.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud risk assessment report with risk score, identified red flags, and recommendation for investigation or clearance

tasks.name: Determine Initial Benefit Eligibility and Duration
tasks.description: Claims Examiner synthesizes all medical, vocational, and regulatory evidence to make formal determination of disability benefit eligibility and establish initial benefit duration period.
tasks.expected_output: Eligibility determination letter documenting decision rationale, benefit approval/denial, approved benefit duration, and appeal rights

tasks.name: Generate Benefit Payment Authorization and Notification
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist prepares benefit payment authorization documentation and generates claimant notification letter detailing benefit amount, payment schedule, and ongoing obligations.
tasks.expected_output: Payment authorization form, claimant notification letter, benefit payment schedule, and documentation package for claims file

tasks.name: Establish Ongoing Claims Monitoring Schedule and Requirements
tasks.description: Claims Examiner establishes periodic review schedule, ongoing documentation requirements, and monitoring protocols to ensure continued benefit eligibility throughout claim duration.
tasks.expected_output: Claims monitoring plan documenting review frequency, required medical updates, work status reporting requirements, and escalation triggers

tasks.name: Conduct Periodic Benefit Continuation Review
tasks.description: Claims Examiner performs scheduled benefit continuation reviews by requesting updated medical documentation and work status information to verify ongoing disability eligibility.
tasks.expected_output: Benefit continuation review report documenting current medical status, work capacity changes, and recommendation to continue, modify, or terminate benefits

tasks.name: Request Updated Medical Documentation for Continuation Review
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist contacts claimant and treating providers to obtain current medical records, treatment updates, and functional status information for benefit continuation assessment.
tasks.expected_output: Updated medical documentation package including recent physician reports, current treatment plans, and functional status assessments

tasks.name: Analyze Claims Data for Trends and Cost Control Opportunities
tasks.description: Senior Claims Analyst reviews aggregated disability claims data to identify trends, reserve adequacy issues, and opportunities for cost optimization and process improvements.
tasks.expected_output: Claims analytics report documenting trends, reserve recommendations, cost drivers, and process improvement opportunities with supporting data visualizations

tasks.name: Document Benefit Continuation Decision and Update Claims File
tasks.description: Claims Support Specialist documents benefit continuation review decision, updates claims file with new medical information, and generates notification to claimant regarding continuation status.
tasks.expected_output: Updated claims file with continuation review documentation, decision letter to claimant, and revised benefit payment schedule if applicable

tasks.name: Manage Claim Closure and Final Documentation
tasks.description: Claims Examiner determines claim closure eligibility based on benefit duration expiration, return-to-work status, or other termination criteria, and ensures comprehensive final documentation.
tasks.expected_output: Claim closure determination letter, final benefit statement, closure documentation package, and archived claims file meeting retention requirements

name: Fraud Detection and Investigation
description: Fraud Investigators and Senior Fraud Investigators identify suspicious claims using AI-powered analytics tools, conduct detailed investigations through surveillance and interviews, and develop evidence to support fraud determinations and legal proceedings. Includes pattern analysis and predictive fraud prevention.
objective: Identify and prevent fraudulent claims through data-driven detection and thorough investigation to protect company assets, reduce claims costs, and support legal action against fraudsters.

tasks.name: Ingest and Normalize Claims Data
tasks.description: Extract claims data from multiple source systems and normalize it into a standardized format for fraud detection analysis.
tasks.expected_output: Cleaned, normalized claims dataset ready for analytics processing

tasks.name: Execute AI-Powered Fraud Detection Algorithms
tasks.description: Run machine learning models and pattern recognition algorithms to identify suspicious claims and generate fraud risk scores.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud risk scoring report with flagged claims and anomaly indicators

tasks.name: Validate AI Detection Results and Filter False Positives
tasks.description: Review AI-generated fraud flags, validate detection accuracy, and filter out false positives to create investigation queue.
tasks.expected_output: Validated list of high-probability fraud cases prioritized for investigation

tasks.name: Develop Investigation Strategy and Case Plan
tasks.description: Create detailed investigation strategy for high-priority fraud cases including surveillance plans, interview schedules, and evidence collection methods.
tasks.expected_output: Investigation case plan document with timeline, resource allocation, and investigation objectives

tasks.name: Conduct Claimant and Witness Interviews
tasks.description: Perform structured interviews with claimants, witnesses, and involved parties to gather statements and identify inconsistencies or suspicious behavior.
tasks.expected_output: Interview transcripts, recorded statements, and investigator notes documenting claimant responses and behavioral observations

tasks.name: Execute Surveillance and Physical Investigation
tasks.description: Conduct field surveillance, site inspections, and physical evidence collection to verify claim details and identify fraudulent activity.
tasks.expected_output: Surveillance reports, photographs, video evidence, and physical inspection documentation

tasks.name: Analyze Pattern and Behavioral Indicators
tasks.description: Examine claim patterns, historical data, and behavioral indicators to identify organized fraud rings or repeat offenders.
tasks.expected_output: Pattern analysis report identifying fraud networks, repeat offenders, and organized fraud schemes

tasks.name: Compile and Organize Evidence Documentation
tasks.description: Organize all investigation evidence including interviews, surveillance, documents, and analysis into a comprehensive case file.
tasks.expected_output: Complete evidence package with organized documentation, exhibits, and chain of custody records

tasks.name: Develop Fraud Determination and Legal Assessment
tasks.description: Analyze all evidence and determine fraud conclusion with legal assessment of case strength and recommendations for prosecution or denial.
tasks.expected_output: Fraud determination report with legal assessment, evidence summary, and recommended action (deny claim, refer to prosecution, settle)

tasks.name: Coordinate with Legal Counsel and Law Enforcement
tasks.description: Communicate investigation findings to legal counsel and law enforcement agencies for potential criminal prosecution and civil recovery actions.
tasks.expected_output: Legal referral documentation, law enforcement reports, and coordination agreements for prosecution support

tasks.name: Process Claim Denial or Adjustment Decision
tasks.description: Execute claim denial, adjustment, or recovery action based on fraud determination and route decision through claims adjudication system.
tasks.expected_output: Processed claim action with denial letter, adjustment documentation, or recovery notice sent to claimant

tasks.name: Identify Subrogation and Recovery Opportunities
tasks.description: Analyze fraud cases to identify third-party liability and recovery opportunities for subrogation pursuit.
tasks.expected_output: Subrogation opportunity assessment with identified liable parties and estimated recovery value

tasks.name: Update Fraud Detection Models with Case Outcomes
tasks.description: Feed investigation outcomes and confirmed fraud cases back into AI models to improve detection accuracy and refine fraud indicators.
tasks.expected_output: Model update documentation, refined fraud detection algorithms, and updated fraud indicator thresholds

tasks.name: Generate Fraud Analytics and Reporting Dashboard
tasks.description: Create comprehensive fraud detection and investigation metrics dashboard tracking detection rates, investigation outcomes, and cost savings.
tasks.expected_output: Executive fraud analytics dashboard with KPIs, trend analysis, and fraud prevention ROI metrics

tasks.name: Document Lessons Learned and Update Fraud Prevention Protocols
tasks.description: Capture investigation insights and update fraud prevention protocols, training materials, and detection strategies based on case outcomes.
tasks.expected_output: Updated fraud prevention procedures, training documentation, and refined detection protocols for organization-wide implementation

quick_wins.task: Update Fraud Detection Models with Case Outcomes
Generate Fraud Analytics and Reporting Dashboard

Update Fraud Detection Models with Case Outcomes
Generate Fraud Analytics and Reporting Dashboard

name: Subrogation and Recovery Case Management
description: Subrogation Specialists identify recovery opportunities against third parties responsible for losses, manage recovery cases from identification through settlement, coordinate salvage and disposal of damaged property, and pursue collections of subrogation receivables. Coordinates with legal counsel on complex matters.
objective: Maximize recovery of claim costs through third-party subrogation, salvage proceeds, and collection efforts while ensuring proper documentation and legal compliance to improve overall claims profitability.

tasks.name: Identify Subrogation Recovery Opportunities
tasks.description: Analyze settled claims to identify third parties potentially responsible for losses and assess viability of subrogation pursuit based on liability, damages, and recovery probability.
tasks.expected_output: Subrogation opportunity assessment report with identified liable third parties, estimated recovery amounts, and recommended pursuit strategy

tasks.name: Conduct Third-Party Liability Investigation
tasks.description: Gather and analyze evidence including police reports, witness statements, and documentation to establish liability and quantify damages against identified third parties.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive liability investigation file with evidence documentation, liability assessment, and damages quantification supporting subrogation claim

tasks.name: Evaluate Legal Feasibility and Counsel Coordination
tasks.description: Consult with legal counsel to assess legal merit, potential defenses, regulatory compliance, and recommend litigation strategy for complex subrogation cases.
tasks.expected_output: Legal feasibility assessment with counsel recommendations, litigation risk analysis, and approved recovery strategy documentation

tasks.name: Prepare and File Subrogation Demand or Claim
tasks.description: Prepare formal demand letter or legal claim documentation with supporting evidence and submit to third party or their insurer to initiate recovery proceedings.
tasks.expected_output: Executed demand letter or filed claim with complete documentation package, proof of service, and case tracking reference

tasks.name: Manage Salvage and Damaged Property Disposition
tasks.description: Coordinate with salvage vendors and auction services to assess, catalog, and dispose of damaged property from settled claims while maximizing recovery value.
tasks.expected_output: Salvage disposition plan with vendor quotes, property catalog, auction listings, and projected recovery proceeds

tasks.name: Execute Salvage Sales and Track Proceeds
tasks.description: Facilitate auction or direct sale of salvaged property, monitor sales transactions, collect proceeds, and reconcile amounts received against projections.
tasks.expected_output: Salvage sale completion documentation with proceeds received, variance analysis, and accounting records for recovery posting

tasks.name: Negotiate Settlement with Third Party or Insurer
tasks.description: Engage in settlement negotiations with liable third party or their insurer to resolve subrogation claim through compromise, structured payment, or full recovery.
tasks.expected_output: Settlement agreement documentation with negotiated recovery amount, payment terms, release language, and execution signatures

tasks.name: Process and Collect Subrogation Receivables
tasks.description: Track and pursue collection of agreed subrogation amounts through payment monitoring, follow-up communications, and escalation to legal action if necessary.
tasks.expected_output: Collection tracking records with payment status, aging analysis, collection letters sent, and escalation documentation for delinquent accounts

tasks.name: Handle Overpayment Recovery and Claimant Collections
tasks.description: Identify overpayments in settled claims and pursue recovery from claimants through negotiation, payment plans, or legal action while maintaining customer relationships.
tasks.expected_output: Overpayment recovery plan with identified amounts, collection strategy, payment arrangement agreements, and collection status tracking

tasks.name: Maintain Recovery Case Documentation and Compliance
tasks.description: Organize and maintain comprehensive case files with all subrogation documentation, legal correspondence, settlement agreements, and recovery records ensuring regulatory compliance.
tasks.expected_output: Complete case file with indexed documentation, compliance checklist, retention schedule compliance, and digital archive records

tasks.name: Monitor and Report Recovery Metrics and Performance
tasks.description: Track subrogation recovery rates, collection percentages, salvage proceeds, and case cycle times to measure performance against targets and identify improvement opportunities.
tasks.expected_output: Recovery performance dashboard with KPI metrics, trend analysis, recovery rate reporting, and variance analysis against targets

tasks.name: Post Recovery Proceeds to Claims Accounting
tasks.description: Record all subrogation recoveries, salvage proceeds, and collection payments in claims accounting system with proper coding and reconciliation to claim reserves.
tasks.expected_output: Posted recovery transactions with accounting entries, reserve adjustments, reconciliation reports, and audit trail documentation

tasks.name: Escalate Complex Cases to Legal Proceedings
tasks.description: Prepare and escalate subrogation cases requiring litigation to legal counsel with comprehensive case documentation, evidence packages, and litigation strategy recommendations.
tasks.expected_output: Litigation package with case summary, evidence documentation, legal strategy recommendations, and authorization for legal proceedings

tasks.name: Close Subrogation Case and Archive Records
tasks.description: Complete final case documentation, confirm all recoveries posted, close case in tracking system, and archive records according to retention policies.
tasks.expected_output: Case closure documentation with final recovery summary, archive confirmation, retention schedule compliance, and case status update

tasks.name: Conduct Post-Recovery Analysis and Continuous Improvement
tasks.description: Analyze completed subrogation cases to identify lessons learned, process improvements, and optimization opportunities for future recovery case management.
tasks.expected_output: Post-recovery analysis report with case performance metrics, process improvement recommendations, and best practices documentation

quick_wins.task: Monitor and Report Recovery Metrics and Performance

name: Claims Operations Optimization and Digital Transformation
description: Claims Analysts and Operations Managers analyze claims workflows to identify automation and efficiency opportunities, implement AI tools and process improvements, monitor performance metrics, and drive digital transformation initiatives. Includes workload management, quality assurance, and change management.
objective: Continuously improve claims operations efficiency through process optimization, technology adoption, and data-driven insights to reduce cycle times, lower costs, improve quality, and enhance employee and customer satisfaction.

tasks.name: Establish Claims Operations Baseline Metrics
tasks.description: Senior Claims Analyst and Operations Manager establish current-state performance metrics including cycle times, cost per claim, quality scores, and employee/customer satisfaction baselines.
tasks.expected_output: Baseline metrics dashboard with KPIs across all claim types and processing stages

tasks.name: Conduct Claims Process Workflow Analysis
tasks.description: Claims Analyst performs detailed mapping and analysis of current claims workflows across all lines of business to identify bottlenecks, redundancies, and automation opportunities.
tasks.expected_output: Process flow diagrams, bottleneck analysis report, and automation opportunity assessment document

tasks.name: Identify AI and Automation Opportunities
tasks.description: Cross-functional team analyzes workflow findings to prioritize high-impact automation opportunities using AI/ML, RPA, and process redesign aligned with digital transformation strategy.
tasks.expected_output: Prioritized automation roadmap with business case analysis, ROI projections, and implementation timeline

tasks.name: Develop AI Tool Implementation Plan
tasks.description: Digital Transformation Manager and technical team develop detailed implementation plan for selected AI tools including vendor selection, system integration requirements, data preparation, and testing strategy.
tasks.expected_output: AI implementation plan document with vendor recommendations, technical specifications, integration architecture, and resource requirements

tasks.name: Design Change Management and Communication Strategy
tasks.description: Operations Manager develops comprehensive change management plan including stakeholder communication, training curriculum, resistance mitigation, and success metrics for digital transformation rollout.
tasks.expected_output: Change management plan with communication calendar, training materials, stakeholder engagement strategy, and adoption metrics

tasks.name: Prepare and Validate Data for AI Model Training
tasks.description: Senior Analytics team extracts, cleanses, and validates historical claims data to prepare datasets for AI model training while ensuring data quality, privacy compliance, and bias detection.
tasks.expected_output: Validated training datasets, data quality report, bias assessment, and data governance documentation

tasks.name: Implement and Test AI Tools in Pilot Environment
tasks.description: Technical team deploys selected AI tools in controlled pilot environment, conducts integration testing, validates accuracy and performance, and documents system behavior and edge cases.
tasks.expected_output: Pilot environment setup, test results report, performance metrics, integration validation documentation, and identified issues/resolutions

tasks.name: Conduct Pilot Testing with Claims Team
tasks.description: Selected claims adjusters, examiners, and analysts test AI tools in pilot environment with real workflows, provide feedback on usability and accuracy, and validate business process changes.
tasks.expected_output: Pilot test results, user feedback report, accuracy validation metrics, process change recommendations, and readiness assessment

tasks.name: Develop and Deliver Training Programs
tasks.description: Training team develops role-specific training materials and conducts comprehensive training for all claims staff on new AI tools, updated processes, and system navigation.
tasks.expected_output: Training curriculum, training materials (videos, guides, job aids), training completion records, and competency assessments

tasks.name: Execute Full Production Rollout
tasks.description: Operations team deploys AI tools and process changes to production environment in phased approach, monitors system performance, and provides support to claims staff during transition.
tasks.expected_output: Production deployment completed, system performance monitoring reports, support ticket logs, and rollout completion documentation

tasks.name: Monitor AI Tool Performance and Quality Metrics
tasks.description: Analytics team continuously monitors AI tool accuracy, claims processing quality, cycle times, and cost metrics post-implementation, identifying performance gaps and optimization opportunities.
tasks.expected_output: Weekly/monthly performance dashboards, quality assurance reports, accuracy metrics, and performance trend analysis

tasks.name: Implement Continuous Process Improvement Cycles
tasks.description: Process Improvement team establishes ongoing feedback loops with claims staff, analyzes performance data, identifies incremental improvements, and implements process refinements on regular cadence.
tasks.expected_output: Improvement recommendations, process update documentation, implementation plans, and quarterly improvement reports

tasks.name: Optimize Workload Management and Resource Allocation
tasks.description: Operations Manager uses AI-driven insights to optimize claims workload distribution, staffing levels, and resource allocation across teams based on claim complexity, volume patterns, and staff capabilities.
tasks.expected_output: Workload optimization recommendations, staffing plan adjustments, resource allocation model, and capacity planning report

tasks.name: Measure and Report Digital Transformation ROI
tasks.description: Analytics team calculates return on investment from digital transformation initiatives by comparing post-implementation metrics against baseline, quantifying cost savings, efficiency gains, and quality improvements.
tasks.expected_output: ROI analysis report with cost-benefit analysis, efficiency metrics comparison, quality improvements documentation, and business impact summary

tasks.name: Plan Next-Phase Digital Transformation Initiatives
tasks.description: Leadership team evaluates lessons learned, identifies emerging technologies and opportunities, and develops roadmap for next-phase digital transformation initiatives to further optimize claims operations.
tasks.expected_output: Next-phase transformation roadmap, technology assessment, business case recommendations, and strategic implementation plan
